description: Detects patterns found in process executions cause by China Chopper like tiny (ASPX) webshells
name: Chopper Webshell Process Pattern
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\w3wp.exe OR process.parent.executable.text:*\\w3wp.exe) AND process.command_line.text:(*&ipconfig&echo* OR *&quser&echo* OR *&whoami&echo* OR *&c\:&echo* OR *&cd&echo* OR *&dir&echo* OR *&echo\ \[E\]* OR *&echo\ \[S\]*))
author: Florian Roth (rule)
MSTI (query)
